column1: Little Goat Diner////Give me nachos or give me death! Being from LA
column2: i'm pretty serious about my nacho situation. Sometimes restaurants don't get the chip right! The chip is the most important fools! Its the foundation of the dish. MUST - GET - IT - RIGHT! Mr. Little Goat - Thank you for getting it right. Who knew? Pancakes here are delicious
column3: milk shakes are great! They also give pretty good french fry as well. Can't go wrong with anything on this diner menu. Â Amazing coffee too. I'll pretty much eat anything they make. There I said it.
